Take a photo during video recording by touching the preview screen.
Video snapshot is disabled when special effects are on.
Video snapshot size lower than video size. Capping to Video size. Please select a resolution higher or equal to the current video size.
Picture resolution in Low Power Mode is not supported. Video size snapshot will be used. Please select High power mode for picture size.
Only Video snapshot size supported for this resolution.
wavelet denoise will not take effect when taking raw pictures
Only H264 video encoding is supported when HFR is ON
Unsupported video resolution for this encoder type
Failed to start audio capture. Microphone may be being used by other apps.
Make a sound to trigger the shutter
Burst shooting is not supported when HDR is ON
Burst shooting is not supported when Audio Capture is ON
Burst shooting is not supported when ISO is not set to \'auto\'.
The linked web site comes from an unknown source and may be a security risk.
This app comes from an unknown source and may be a security risk. Only install apps from sources you trust.
